interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Don Juan DeMarco
Review Date: 2015/11/28
Store: Marlon Brando  (Actor),     Johnny Depp  (Actor),     Jeremy Leven  (Director, Writer)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Warner Home Video, All Titles
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Don Juan DeMarco (DVD)', 'Academy Award winners Marlon Brando and Faye Dunaway star with Johnny Depp in this romantic drama about a man who believes himself to be the legendary Don Juan--and who attempts suicide after the loss of his one true love. But placed under the care of a world-weary therapist, the patient begins to cure the doctor.', ']]>', 'Amazon.com', "You might not get a thrill from the sight of Faye Dunaway and Marlon Brando throwing popcorn into each other's mouths, but that didn't stop", 'Don Juan DeMarco', "from gaining a new lease on life thanks to cable television and home video. It's a quirky romantic comedy about a mental patient (Johnny Depp) who claims to be Don Juan, the world's greatest lover, and he gets quite a few women to believe it's true. Brando plays the psychiatrist who tries to analyze his patient's apparent delusion, and Dunaway plays Brando's wife, who wants to inject some Don Juan-ish romance into their marital routine. Walking a fine line between precious comedy, wistful drama, and delicate fantasy, the movie gets a big dose of charm from its esteemed cast, with Depp delivering dialogue that would have sounded ludicrous from a lesser actor. This may not be a great movie, but it is guaranteed to put you in an amorous mood.", '--Jeff Shannon']
Average Rating: 4.7

reference_summary:
Biography: Johnny Depp (2004) [DVD]
Johnny Depp  (Actor),     Keira Knightley  (Actor)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, A&E Home Video, Biography, All Titles
["Chronicles the life of the eccentric, sensual, uncompromising, and media-shy star of Pirates of the Caribbean. Johnny Depp rebelled against his early image as a Hollywood hunk, opting to play complex characters in such movies as Edward Scissorhands and What's Eating Gilbert Grape?. Along the way, he romanced actress Winona Ryder and model Kate Moss before wedding French singing sensation Vanessa Paradis."]
{'Format': 'Color, DVD, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Johnny Depp, Keira Knightley, Steven Smith', 'Language': 'Unqualified (DTS ES 6.1)', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Runtime': '1 hour', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.42 x 0.58 inches; 1 Pounds', 'Media Format': 'Color, DVD, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour', 'Release date': 'June 27, 2006', 'Actors': 'Johnny Depp, Keira Knightley', 'Studio': 'A&E Home Video', 'Writers': 'Steven Smith', 'Number of discs': '1'}
If you're really into Depp, then you're going to love this!
then you're going to love this!
Inside the Actors Studio: Johnny Depp
n/a  (Actor),     Jeff Wurtz  (Director)    Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Special Interests
["Johnny Depp Is One of the Most Versatile and Intriguing Actors Working Today. Launching His Career As a Teenage Heartthrob, Then Moving Into Eccentric Roles in Films Like Edward Scissorhands and What's Eating Gilbert Grape, He Has Alternated Between Independent Films Like Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas and Mainstream Blockbusters Like Finding Neverland, Charlie and the Chocolate Factory and the Pirates of the Caribbean Trilogy, Leading to the Inescapable Conclusion That His Future Is As Bright and Varied As His Vivid, Unbridled Imagination. In This Unforgettable 2002 Interview, Depp Gives the Students of the Actors Studio a Rare Glimpse Inside the Method That Brought Inspiring Characters, Like the Charismatic Don Juan Demarco, Gonzo Journalist Raoul Duke, and Eccentric Filmmaker Ed Wood, to Life. Directors: Jeff Wurtz Language: English Run Time: 50 Minutes."]

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Favorite Actor:** Strong preference for Johnny Depp, with a keen interest in his life and career as illustrated through biographical content and documentaries.
- **Genre Preferences:** Enjoys biopics and complex character portrayals, demonstrating a taste for richer storytelling over mainstream blockbusters, although this has recently been challenged by a lower opinion on a Depp film that did not meet expectations.
- **Format Preference:** Favorable towards DVDs, indicating a preference for traditional viewing experiences, particularly valuing physical collections and detailed presentations.
- **Engagement with Content:** Exhibits genuine enthusiasm for detailed insights into unique celebrities, especially those who transcend typical Hollywood stereotypes. However, recent interactions reveal a more critical stance toward specific films, impacting overall satisfaction with his choices.
- **Rating Behavior:** Typically expresses moderate satisfaction, previously reflected in a 4.0 rating, but a recent review showed a significant shift, denoting a critical view towards certain works, as evidenced by a harsh 1.0 rating. This inconsistency hints at a deepening engagement with content quality and personal taste.

Overall, the user maintains a focused interest in artists like Depp, favoring deeper narratives and character studies, while their recent critiques indicate a possible reevaluation of some of their viewing choices. Their interactions blend admiration with a thoughtful critique of the material.
